name: Satyendra Varma DN

about: I am a techno-functional consultant with a passion for bridging technology and business. Experienced in SAP, supply chain, finance, procurement, and AI-driven solutions. I love creating impactful solutions that connect systems, data, and people seamlessly.

projects.title: AI-driven AgriTech Platform
